content.Description: The token to authenticate against the API service. Test keys are not supported for Conversations see https://support.messagebird.com/hc/en-us/articles/360000670709-What-is-the-difference-between-a-live-key-and-a-test-key-
When to pull records starting at what date. ISO8601 format of date, defaults to 3 years ago.
Config object for stream maps capability. For more information check out Stream Maps.
User-defined config values to be used within map expressions.
'True' to enable schema flattening and automatically expand nested properties.
The max depth to flatten schemas.
